channel.title: Spawning Objects
channel.description: How come when you spawn objects using your client, they don't always appear in the correct space (and you have to log out and back in for them to appear coorect from there), and how can you fix this?

item.title: Spawning Objects
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

what about the objects not spawned on anything that dont spawn correctly sometimes?

Edit:
Also, either all of the objects spawn off or the yare all correct, possibly some kind of error with player coord locking correct when u log in

Read full topic

@jonaske wrote:

well when there is already an object it could be it spawns wrong so the best is u first delete the object and then spawn it go clien.java and go litlle down u will see deleteobject(…)
add the object that there already is spawned and then i should work perfectly

item.title: Spawning Objects
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

well i have alot of objects being spawned, but sometimes when i log in the objects coords are off and i have to re-log for them to move back into position, (like a dummy will spawn 5 sqs. off from were it should be, but when i re-log it goes back into place). Of course this doesnt always happen, but it is common on my server for some reason. Am I soawning to many objects? Or is it something else?

Read full topic
